utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The reactor’s gonna blow in three seconds, we’re never gonna make it!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: You’ve got to get out of here! Save yourself!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No! I won’t leave you!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Don’t worry about me, I’m a robot! I’m just a machine!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No you’re not! Not to me!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I am extremely talented!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you’re great! Okay, let’s take it from…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: No, I mean I was really acting my ass off.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, I thought I was pretty good too.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh yeah, you’re solid. Yeah, you’re just no me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know what? I think that’s enough for now. Yeah. I don’t want to be over rehearsed.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Fine! I’ll do it without you! I don’t need you or anybody else! I’m gonna make it on my own! You’ll see!! You’ll all see!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So uh, what’s this thing you’re auditioning for?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, it’s a new TV show. Yeah. I’m up for the part of Mac Macaveli or "Mac." Yeah, I’m a detective and I solve crimes with the help of my robot partner. He’s a, he’s a Computerized Humanoid Electronically Enhanced Secret Enforcer or-or "C.H.E.E.S.E."

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: So Mac and C.H.E.E.S.E.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s the title! Yeah! Y’know they really lucked out that the initials spell cheese.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: That is lucky.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Huh—Wait so Joey if you get this, you’re gonna be like the star of your own TV show! I mean you’ll be like the Big Cheese! Or the Big Mac—Hey! You love those!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, don’t get your hopes up, because probably not gonna happen.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Now-now, why would you say that Joseph?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I mean come on you guys! My own TV show? I just don’t know if I’m good enough.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I am.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Joey, what are you talking about? You’re a terrific actor.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You really think so?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Ugh, how can you even ask that question?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Whoa, she's pretty.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, and oh she's really nice too. She taught me all about how to work the cameras, and smell-the-fart acting.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I'm sorry, what?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Excuse me?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: It's like, you got so many lines to learn so fast, that sometimes you need a minute to remember your next one. So while you're thinkin' of it, you take this big pause where you look all intense, you know, like this.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, ok.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: There's my scene, there's my scene. "Mrs. Wallace, I'm Dr. Drake Ramoray, your sister's neurosurgeon. I'm afraid the situation is much worse than we expected. Your sister is suffering from a..."

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Vell, Eva, ve've done some excellent vork here, and I vould have to say, your pwoblem is qviiite clear.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I play Al Pacino's butt. All right? He goes into the shower, and then- I'm his butt.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh my God.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: C'mon, you guys. This is a real movie, and Al Pacino's in it, and that's big!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh no, it's terrific, it's- it's- y'know, you deserve this, after all your years of struggling, you've finally been able to crack your way into show business.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, okay, fine! Make jokes, I don't care! This is a big break for me!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You're right, you're right, it is.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: So you gonna invite us all to the big opening?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: All right well, I’m outta here. Wish me luck.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Gooood luck! Gooood luck! We all wish you good luuuuuuuuck!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, whatever.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It’s your turn.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, are we playing this?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Hey! How’d the audition go?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Terrible! I messed up every line! I shouldn’t even be an actor!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wait a minute, are you doing that thing where you pretend it didn’t go well but it really did go well?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, did I fool ya?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Totally!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So it did go well.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, it went amazingly well!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Great!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh that’s great!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah-yeah, it’s down to me and two other guys.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Wow!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And I know both of them, they’re really good. One of them is the guy from those allergy commercials who’s always getting chased by those big flowers…

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh, I love that guy!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh-oh, what are you doing?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What am I doing?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I’m just so nervous! Y’know? The callback isn’t until tomorrow at five. I feel like my head is going to explode!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, it is overdue.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Look, don’t worry. Okay? You’re gonna be fine.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: There’s just so much pressure. I mean no offense, but what you guys do is very different. I don’t know if you’d understand.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yeah, none of us have to deal with pressure at our jobs.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yes, Fran. I know what time it is, but I'm looking at the WENUS and I'm not happy!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Alright, well I'm tearing the lettuce.

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: Uh-huh. Is it dirty?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh-oh, no no don't worry, I'm gonna wash it.

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: Don't, I like it dirty.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: That's your call.

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: So, uh, what are you going to do next?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, I thought that I would cut up the tomatos.

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: Are they, uh, firm?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: They'r alright.

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: You sure they haven't gone bad? You're sure they're not very, very bad?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: No really, they're OK.

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: You gonna slice them up real nice?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Actually, I was gonna do them jullienne.

utterance.speaker: Interviewer
utterance.content: Aaaahhhhhhh.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: I'm outa here.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Monica, I’m quitting! I just helped an 81 year old woman put on a thong and she didn’t even buy it! I’m telling you I’m quitting! That’s it! I’m talking to my boss right now! Yes I am! Yes I am! Yes I am! Yes I am! Yes I am! Yes I am! Okay bye, call me when you get this message.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Well, what happened?

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Well, he came in for a massage and everything was fine until...

utterance.speaker: All
utterance.content: Ohhhhhh!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: And all of the sudden his hands weren't the problem anymore.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Was it...

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh, Boy Scouts could've camped under it!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You ate my sandwich?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Leedbetter
utterance.content: It was a simple mistake. It could happen to anyone.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh-oh really?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Leedbetter
utterance.content: Now-now calm down. Come look in my office, some of it my still be in the trash.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Dr. Leedbetter
utterance.content: Well, it was quite large. I-I-I-I-I had to throw most of it away.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: You-you-you-you threw my sandwich away!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: MY SANDWICH?!!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: MY SANDWICH!!!!!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I want this part so much! Y’know? If I don’t get this part I’m never gonna eat Macaroni and Cheese again!—No, I didn’t say that! That’s a lie.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh come on guys, it’s not like I moved to Europe! I just moved across the hall! And we would have you over all the time if it weren’t for Monica’s allergies. You’re right, I could never lie to you. She hates you. Should I get that? Hello? Uh no, Joey’s not here right now. Can I take a message? Yeah, okay so the audition has been moved from 5:00 to 2:30? Okay great. Bye.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Ahh! Aren’t you dressed yet?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Am I naked again?!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: We’re supposed to meet my parents in 15 minutes.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah okay, I was just talking to the guys. Just look at them I mean, is it okay if they come visit?

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Wh?! What about my allergies?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh right, your allergies. All her, she hates you.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yes!! Ha-ha!! All right! Hey! How cool would it be if you could watch like a real life-sized version of this? Huh? I mean how crazy would that be?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: As crazy as soccer?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hello? What are you talking about? The audition’s not ‘til 5:00! Well, nobody told me! Who’d you talk to? Nevermind!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You mean you didn’t get it from this?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: The allergy guy got the part! Thanks!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well, maybe we can fix it y’know? Maybe we can send him some-some big-big flowers and scare him!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: How could you do this to me Chandler?! This part could’ve turned my whole career around!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I messed up. Okay? I’m sorry, I really messed up.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, you don’t even live here anymore! What are you doing answering my phone? I have my machine!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Which I bought for ya. Taught ya how to use it. You thought it was a copier. Look, if there was anything I could do, I would do it. Okay? But everybody’s allowed one mistake, right?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You know he coulda gotten me a VCR, he coulda gotten me a set of golf clubs, but no, he has to get me the woman repeller! The eyesore from the Liberace house of crap!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: It's not that bad.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, yeah, easy for you to say, you don't have to walk around sporting some reject from the Mr. T collection.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Chandler, Chandler.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I pity the fool who puts on my jewelry, I do, I do. I pity the fool that. . . Hi!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Yeah, I mean when you were late last night, Kathy and I got to talking, and one thing to another and…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: And what?! Did you sleep with her?!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: No! No! No! I just kissed her.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?!! That’s even worse!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: How is that worse?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I don’t know! But it’s the same!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You’re right, I have no excuses! I was totally over the line.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Over the line?! You-you’re-you’re so far past the line, that you-you can’t even see the line! The line is a dot to you!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Look, I’m not saying that you should magically forgive me! But you’re not perfect! You’ve made some errors in judgment too!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Name one!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What happened?!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Awww, man! He promised he wouldn’t take the chairs!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: What the hell happened?!! How were you locked in?!! And where the hell is all of our stuff?!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well, this guy came by to look at the unit and-and he said he didn’t think big enough to fit a grown man!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: So--You got in voluntarily?!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I was tryin’ to make a sale!! Oh, man, if I ever run into that guy again, do you know what I’m gonna do?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: BEND OVER?!!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Ok, now, remember, no trading. You get the pretty one, I get the mess.

utterance.speaker: Lorraine
utterance.content: Hi, Joey. Well well, look what you brought.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: ...And what did you bring?

utterance.speaker: Lorraine
utterance.content: She's checking the coats. Joey, I'm gonna go wash the cab smell off my hands. Will you get me a white Zinfandel, and a glass of red for Janice.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Janice?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Janice?!

utterance.speaker: Janice
utterance.content: Oh.... my.... God.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey's tailor...took advantage of me.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: No way! I've been going to the guy for 12 years.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh come on! He said he was going to do my inseam, and he ran his hand up my leg, and then, there was definite...

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: What?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Cupping.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That's how they do pants! Ross, will you tell him? Isn't that how they measure pants?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Yes, yes it is. In prison!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I said name one!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I can’t believe I did this! What an idiot!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Oh, stop beating yourself up! People make mistakes! These things happen! There aren’t any message you’ve forgotten to give me are there? Apparently you’re not very good at it! I…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Do you think he’ll ever forgive me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Of course he will! But Chandler the most important thing is you forgive yourself!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know what? I-I kinda have.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Already? That’s pretty bad what you did.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Y’know what? He will forgive you. And I like to bring a pad with me when I go answer the phone just in case… Okay…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You didn’t see how mad he was, y’know?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I’m sure he will forgive you. Look, we have all been there! Y’know, you fight, you make up, it’s just the way it works.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It took two people to break up this relationship!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Yeah! You and that girl from that copy place, which yesterday you took full responsibility for!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I didn’t know what I was taking full responsibility for! Okay?! I didn’t finish the whole letter!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: What?!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: I fell asleep!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: You fell asleep?!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: It was 5:30 in the morning, and you had rambled on for 18 pages. Front and back!! Oh-oh-oh, and by the way, Y-O-U-apostrophe-R-E means ‘you are,’ Y-O-U-R means ‘your!’

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Y'know I can’t believe I even thought about getting back together again! We are so over!!

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: FINE BY ME!!

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: And hey! Just so you know, it’s not that common! It doesn’t happen to every guy! And it is a big deal!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I KNEW IT!!!!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You had no right to go out with him.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: That is the most ridiculous...

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: You sold me out.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: I did not sell you out.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Yes you did. You absolutely sold me...

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Would you let me talk.

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Did you just flick me?

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: OK, well, you wouldn't let me finish and I was jus- Ow. That hurt

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Oh! All right. Now, let's not do this!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Happy thoughts! Happy thoughts!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: OK, now I'm gonna kick some ass.

utterance.speaker: Monica and Rachel
utterance.content: Ow! Ow! Ow!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I know! I know! I know!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Alright, now I will let go if you both stop.

utterance.speaker: Rachel
utterance.content: Fine!

utterance.speaker: Monica
utterance.content: Fine!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: There we go.You know what, if we were in prison, you guys would be, like, my bitches.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Okay, buddy-boy. Here it is. You hide my clothes, I'm wearing everything you own.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh my God!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Look at me! I'm Chandler! Could I be wearing any more clothes? Maybe if I wasn't going commando...

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah. Whew, it's hot with all of this stuff on. I ah, I better not do any, I don't know, lunges.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Joey? Got you a Joey Special, two pizzas! Joe? Hello? Damnit! Hello? No, Joey’s not here right now, but I can take a message I think. He’s still got a chance for the part?! Oh, that’s great news! Well no obviously not for the actor who was mauled by his dog. Oh well, that’s great. I will give Joey the message. Thank you! Yes! Okay, Mac audition at 2:00. Allergy actor attacked. By dog not flowers.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Please tell me you got the message!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What message?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: The actor playing Mac couldn’t do it, they needed to see you at 2 o’clock.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: What?! It’s 6 o’clock!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Du-du-I wrote it, I wrote it on the board! I wrote it on the board, then I went all over New York City looking for ya! I went to Ross’s! I went to the coffeehouse! I went to any place that they made sandwiches!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: I can’t believe this Chandler!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Sorry! I-I-I don’t know what to say.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Well you-you-you-you might say congratulations! I saw the board! I went to the audition! I got the part!!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Is that supposed to be funny! I was really worried over here!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh, well I’m uh…

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Y’know, sometimes that fake out thing is just mean!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Oh wow! Okay man, I’m sorry. I did not mean to make you feel bad.

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Well that’s good. Because you didn’t! And I’m incredibly happy for ya!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: That’s mean! You really had me going there!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: Oh, we could do this all day.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah, you’re right. Okay look, listen, let’s talk about what a huge star I’m gonna be!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: You are gonna be a huge star! I’m gonna hug ya!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: You hug me!

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: All right!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Hey, do we do this too much?

utterance.speaker: Chandler
utterance.content: I think so. Yeah, get off me.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Yeah.

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Come on C.H.E.E.S.E., I’m not leaving without you! Try routing your backup source through your primary CPU.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I can’t! My circuits are fried! They’re fried I tell you!!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Wow! Well then I’ll just have to carry you.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: That’ll be a neat trick, when you’re, when you’re dead!

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Ross, you don’t have to yell.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: There was just an explosion, okay? My hearing would be impaired.

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: I thought you were excellent! In fact for a minute there I was like, "Ooh, where’d Ross go?"

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Thank you! And I have to say that first scene when you meet Mac…

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: Yeah?

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Oh my God. I mean…

utterance.speaker: Joey
utterance.content: Y’know what? I think that’s enough for today. Thanks for your help!

utterance.speaker: Phoebe
utterance.content: He’s holding us back.

utterance.speaker: Ross
utterance.content: Totally.
